name: Nature's a buffet
description:
Can be played on a phone, Though this version will receive updates post-jam. - https://crispypear.itch.io/natures-a-buffet-mobile

Your fish points towards your mouse and moves forward when you hold left-click.

Right-click shoots a projectile which damages enemies, though it also takes away some of your power.

If you lose power, you get smaller, and can't see as far as before. If you lose all power, you die.

Power is regenerated if you have a powerlevel low enough to die by shooting, and more power is regenerated if you jump out of the water. You can also get power through eating food, which has no limit on giving you power.

All enemies can be killed, except the suicidal helicopter.
